akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 100–690, title VII, § 7286, Nov. 18, 1988, 102 Stat. 4460

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5774. Repealed. Pub. L. 100–690, title VII, § 7286, Nov. 18, 1988, 102 Stat. 4460
Section, Pub. L. 93–415, title IV, § 405, as added Pub. L. 98–473, title II, § 660, Oct. 12, 1984, 98 Stat. 2127, provided for an Advisory Board on Missing Children.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1988, see section 7296(a) of Pub. L. 100–690, set out as an Effective Date of 1988 Amendment note under section 11101 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
